select
distinct
from book
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into book (id, cid, title, subtitle, author, publisher, pages, image, binding, translater, isbn13, isbn10, price, pubdate, num_raters, average, num) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{binding,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{translater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isbn13,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isbn10,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pubdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{numRaters,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{average,jdbcType=REAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update book
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{record.subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publisher = #{record.publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pages = #{record.pages,jdbcType=INTEGER},
image = #{record.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
binding = #{record.binding,jdbcType=CHAR},
translater = #{record.translater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isbn13 = #{record.isbn13,jdbcType=CHAR},
isbn10 = #{record.isbn10,jdbcType=CHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pubdate = #{record.pubdate,jdbcType=DATE},
num_raters = #{record.numRaters,jdbcType=INTEGER},
average = #{record.average,jdbcType=REAL},
num = #{record.num,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update book set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{record.subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{record.author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{record.publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pages = #{record.pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{record.image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, binding = #{record.binding,jdbcType=CHAR}, translater = #{record.translater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn13 = #{record.isbn13,jdbcType=CHAR}, isbn10 = #{record.isbn10,jdbcType=CHAR}, price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pubdate = #{record.pubdate,jdbcType=DATE}, num_raters = #{record.numRaters,jdbcType=INTEGER}, average = #{record.average,jdbcType=REAL}, num = #{record.num,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pages = #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
binding = #{binding,jdbcType=CHAR},
translater = #{translater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isbn13 = #{isbn13,jdbcType=CHAR},
isbn10 = #{isbn10,jdbcType=CHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pubdate = #{pubdate,jdbcType=DATE},
num_raters = #{numRaters,jdbcType=INTEGER},
average = #{average,jdbcType=REAL},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update book set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pages = #{pages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, binding = #{binding,jdbcType=CHAR}, translater = #{translater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn13 = #{isbn13,jdbcType=CHAR}, isbn10 = #{isbn10,jdbcType=CHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pubdate = #{pubdate,jdbcType=DATE}, num_raters = #{numRaters,jdbcType=INTEGER}, average = #{average,jdbcType=REAL}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
